text: Houari Boumédiène ( ; ALA-LC: Hawwārī Būmadyan; born Mohammed Ben Brahim Boukherouba; 23 August 1932 – 27 December 1978) was Chairman of the Revolutionary Council of Algeria from 19 June 1965 until 12 December 1976. He was the second President of Algeria until his death in 1978. ==Notes== ==Other websites== * Le règne de Houari Boumediène , El Watan, 27 décembre 2008 * Video clip of a speech by Houari Boumédiène Category:1932 births Category:1978 deaths Category:Presidents of Algeria
title: Houari Boumédiène
